## How to get R and RStudio


Start by installing R, which is available from the Comprehensive R Archive Network (CRAN) at this [link](https://cran.rstudio.com/).

\bigskip\bigskip

A video guide for installing R can be found at this [link](https://vimeo.com/203516510).

\bigskip\bigskip

Next install RStudio, which is available at this [link](https://rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/).

\bigskip\bigskip

A video guide for installing RStudio can be found at this [link](https://vimeo.com/203516968).

\bigskip\bigskip

Another guide for installing R and RStudio can be found at this [link](https://rstudio-education.github.io/hopr/starting.html).
